name: Grow
body:
### About

Grow is [Bware studios](http://bwarestudios.com)'s second game for [#1GAM](http://onegameamonth.com/) contest. It was going to be the entry for May with theme Grow but time passed and was not ready till summer...

### Download and try

- Mac [Grow1.app.zip](./dist/mac/Grow1.app.zip)
- Android [Grow1-debug.apk](./dist/android/Grow1-debug.apk)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
